name: Idle Sins
description: The mind is a strange thing it's so powerful and our conscience is so simple yet the mind itself is cluttered and complex and so so fragile so you might be wondering who maintains all that? Who sifts through your sins and your cringy memories and abundance of cute animal pictures so you can live your life in peace and quiet? Well, it's blobby of course your subconscious janitor guide him as he tries to survive against the sins of your mind.
